name: Lethal Intrusion
description:
Lethal Intrusion

Play as a little pathogen. Move fast and act precisely to slash your way through this hostile world. The current state of the game is quite incomplete, somewhat of a walking simulator. Made with huge inspiration from Hollow Knight

Made for the Metroidvania Month 19

Controls:

Movement: A, S for left, and right respectively
Jump: Space
Dash: J | L SHIFT | L CTRL
Slash: K
Pause: Esc/P

Debug:-
Get Hurt: H
Spawn Coins: I/P (on mouse position)
Toggle Dash, Wall Cling, Double Jump: 1, 2, 3. Respectively
Toggle Debug Info: F

Made By:

VantaTree - Programmer (Itch.io, Github)
VicL - Game Designer (Itch.io)
Proxynth - Composer (Itch.io)
Vinix - Composer (Itch.io)
Cyborgnekosica - 2D Artist (Itch.io)
Raiku - 2D BG Atrist (Itch.io)Lukasnob - 2D Atrist (Itch.io)
